entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# Laungage Service is crash if UNITY project contains class named "Program" inherit MonoBehaviour #69525
    17.8
  • Partial method '..' must have an implementation part because it has accessibility modifiers.RoslynCS8795 #69522
  • `ImmutableList<T>` on net7 and compiler-expression-conversions. #69521
  • Compiler should not use `Environment` type #69516
  • C# compilation performance regression in latest 7.0.400 SDK #69515
  • C# - When jumping to definition in a decompiled or source link file for the first time, the cursor is always at the beginning of file #69514
    17.8 P4
  • False-positive CS0656 error when LangVersion=11, TargetFramework=net6.0 and PolySharp is installed #69527
  • When saving, some Code Cleanup fixers modify C# source files excluded from compilation #69512
    17.8 P4

Closed

  • Collection expressions need an unnecessary brace if a cast expression is a generic type with a type alias #69508
  • Collection expressions codefix changes behaviour for ImmutableArray<T> #69507
  • [Bug]: Autocomplete for `override` methods does not produce anything #68540
    17.8 P4
  • Prefer simple using statement setting not respected when "No" #68682
  • Use background work indicator for Go To Implementation #69390
    18.0
  • Use background work indicator for Go To Definition #69389
    18.0
  • Make brackets of class and methods bold #68582
    Backlog
  • Documents from different projects with the same path are considered the same since 4.6.0 #68814
  • VS Pro 2022 (64-bit) v17.5.3 - Feature 'Symbol Search' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #67598

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "remove positive Unary expressions to avoid confusion in addit… #69533
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Collection expressions: emit Array.Empty<T>() for [] with tar… #69532
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test removing check #69531
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix reassigned-variable-underlining with primary constructors #69530
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include documentation in MetadataReference creation #69529
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update 17.7 servicing branch queue #69528
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extract a shared helper for walking statements for a few analyzers #69524
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Adjust IDE0290 code fix to keep comments before removed syntax node (#69012) #69518
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Stop descending through tuple when no slot can be created #69513
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Unsplit `NullableWalker` after `out` argument #69511
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Fix TFM for function pointer expected output tests #69506
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid binding lambda body if fully typed #69505
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69504
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Fix parsing of generics in casts. #69519
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Do not convert immutable arrays on downlevel runtimes #69520
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pull out syntax helpers used in 'create collection initializer/collection' into utility types #69526
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move 'use object expression' fixer over to helper base class #69523
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • React to csharplang changes #69487
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [Port] Fix regression for suppressed diagnostics in Suggestion diagnostics tagger #69517
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, OnDeckForServicing
  • Share common code in 'use collection expression'. #69502
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce LOH allocations for SemanticToken classification in LSP #69496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update packages to prep for NuGet publish #69497
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Add analyzer/fixer to suggest changing code like `ImmutableArray.CreateBuilder<int>(); ...` to a collection expression. #69500
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Fix analyzer conflicts on Linux (#69406)" #69498
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Improve error recovery when encountering errant close-paren tokens. #69482
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2244264 #69366
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Implement support for emitting PrivateImplementationDetails to EnC deltas #69485
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IDE changes for analyzer loading #69470
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers, Backlog
  • Move csharp decompiler service down to features so it is available in vscode #69501
    Area-IDE, untriaged
